thread.title: Iman Shumpert sprained his ankle trying to defend Bradley Beal’s vicious step-back move
thread.title_full: Iman Shumpert sprained his ankle trying to defend Bradley Beal’s vicious step-back move

author: Kofie Yeboah
title: Iman Shumpert sprained his ankle trying to defend Bradley Beal’s vicious step-back move
text: Rec In the third quarter of this close Cavs- Wizards matchup, Bradley Beal decided to use this move on Iman Shumpert: If you can look closely, you can see that Shumpert’s ankles got caught up with Kevin Love’s foot. That’s still a smooth move by Beal at the end of the day. Let’s just hope that Shumpert is OK because he is out for the remainder of the game with an ankle sprain. . @imanshumpert suffered L ankle sprain, will not return tonight. — Joe Gabriele (@CavsJoeG) February 7, 2017 Next Up In ##Lookit
